list.en: May I call on you tomorrow?
I paid a visit to Sally last night.
Long time no see.
Could you bring your daughter on the next visit?
list.cn: 下次来的时候你能带上你女儿吗?

list.en: Can I drop in on you on my way home?
list.cn: 我能在回家的路上顺便去看看你吗?

list.en: Don't forget to give me a call when you want to come.
list.cn: 你想来的时候别忘了给我打电话。

list.en: Today is mother's day. I've decided to go home to see my mum.
list.cn: 今天是母亲节。我决定回家看我妈妈。

list.en: You are quite a special guest.
Let's pay her a visit.
I'll fly to Canada to see my aunt tomorrow.
list.cn: 明天我要飞到加拿大去看我的阿姨。

list.en: I'm your new neighbor. My name is Susan.
list.cn: 我是你的新邻居。我叫苏珊。

list.en: Did you just move in next door?
I'm really glad that we're neighbors.
I've just across the street.
I live in room three, oh three and you.
list.cn: 我住在3号房间，哦，3号，还有你。

list.en: You must be new here.
I live next to you.
Look, our new neighbors are moving in.
list.cn: 我们的新邻居要搬进来了。

list.en: So we're neighbors. Call me Frank.
list.cn: 所以我们是邻居。叫我弗兰克吧。

list.en: Since we are neighbors, if you need any help, please come to me.
list.cn: 既然我们是邻居，如果你需要任何帮助，请来找我。

list.en: I just met our new neighbors.
list.cn: 我刚认识了我们的新邻居。

list.en: My neighbor is a man of high virtue.
list.cn: 我的邻居是个德高望重的人。

list.en: I resigned my children to the care of a neighbor.
list.cn: 我把孩子交给邻居照看。

list.en: My neighbor is a lawyer.
The whole neighborhood praises him.
He lives next to me.
I've heard a lot about you.
list.cn: 我听说过很多关于你的事。

list.en: This is my card.
I'm happy to know you.
I feel as if I have seen you before.
list.cn: 我觉得好像以前见过你。

list.en: I'm glad to finally have a chance to meet you.
list.cn: 我很高兴终于有机会见到你。

list.en: Nice to meet you.
We're two of a kind.
Can I buddy up with you?
I want to make friends with you.
Let's be friends.
My colleagues are warm hearted and cooperative.
I got on well with my colleagues.
list.cn: 我和同事们相处得很好。

list.en: I'm right behind you.
I have our definite support.
How do you get along with your colleagues?
list.cn: 你和你的同事相处得怎么样?

list.en: You should be cautious when dealing with coworkers.
How would your colleagues evaluate you?
list.cn: 你的同事会如何评价你?

list.en: My colleagues might disagree with me.
list.cn: 我的同事可能不同意我的观点。

list.en: Have you met all your colleagues?
list.cn: 你见过所有的同事了吗?

list.en: Did you have a good flight?
Did you get any sleep on the plane?
I am here to meet you today.
We met when you visited Taiwan last time.
list.cn: 上次你来台湾时我们见过面。

list.en: Have you had breakfast yet?
I've made a reservation at the hotel. You stayed last time.
list.cn: 我已经在旅馆预订了房间。上次你留下了。

list.en: We've booked a western style room for you.
list.cn: 我们已经为您订了一间西式房间。

list.en: Let's go to the office first.
Did you sleep well last night?
Do you have an appointment?
It's such a pleasure to meet you.
This is the schedule of today.
Thanks for coming all the way from abroad.
list.cn: 谢谢你从国外远道而来。

list.en: Anyone home?
How have you been recently?
Do I need to bring anything?
Welcome to my house.
It's so nice of you to come around.
Thanks for inviting me.
I'll be there after dinner.
I haven't seen you for a long time.
Nice to see you, my old friend.
list.cn: 很高兴见到你，我的老朋友。

list.en: I'm here to see Jane.
How have you been these years?
list.cn: 这些年来你过得怎么样?

list.en: You've changed little.
Thanks for the delicious dinner.
Thank you very much for a wonderful evening.
list.cn: 非常感谢你让我度过了一个美好的夜晚。

list.en: Do you know any of those people?
Come in and have a seat.
Is anyone hungry?
What would you like to eat?
May I serve you some beef steak?
Would you like something to drink?
It doesn't matter to me.
Let me get you some more wine.
Just a drop, please.
Please make yourself at home.
What class?
We graduated from the same university.
list.cn: 我们毕业于同一所大学。

list.en: We are Yale university alumni.
list.cn: 我们是耶鲁大学的校友。

list.en: I had never seen her since we graduated from university.
list.cn: 自从我们大学毕业后，我就再也没见过她。

list.en: I came all the way and finally get in touch with him by the websites of alumni.
list.cn: 我一路赶来，最后通过校友网站联系上了他。

list.en: After many years, I still clearly remember the alumni.
list.cn: 多年后，我仍然清楚地记得校友。

list.en: I heard that she and you are alumni.
Could we schedule another appointment?
I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.
My alarm clock didn't go off.
The traffic is really heavy today.
list.cn: 今天交通真是太拥挤了。

list.en: I was working late last night and couldn't get up on time.
list.cn: 我昨晚工作到很晚，没能准时起床。

list.en: I wish I had come earlier.
I was late on the first date.
list.cn: 我第一次约会就迟到了。

list.en: I lost my car keys.
My car died.
Nobody woke me up.
My alarm didn't go off.
Thank you so much for the flowers and the secretary's day card.
list.cn: 非常感谢你的花和秘书的贺卡。

list.en: Just a small gift. Please take it.
list.cn: 只是一个小礼物。请收下吧。

list.en: Thank you for sending me such a beautiful gift.
list.cn: 谢谢你送我这么漂亮的礼物。

list.en: I'm so glad you like it.
Thank you for your gift, but I can't accept it.
list.cn: 谢谢你的礼物，但是我不能接受。

list.en: It's just a thought.
I wonder if you like it.
You have done a lot for this negotiation.
list.cn: 你为这次谈判做了很多。

list.en: Please accept it.
I really like this gift.
list.cn: 我真的很喜欢这个礼物。

list.en: This gift is too expensive so I don't think I can accept it.
list.cn: 这个礼物太贵了，我想我不能接受。

list.en: The gift was too valuable.
I hope you'll accept it.
I'd like you to take this bracelet as a gift.
list.cn: 我想让你把这个手镯作为礼物收下。

list.en: I'm going to visit a friend in hospital this afternoon.
list.cn: 今天下午我要去医院看望一个朋友。

list.en: Many friends went to see me during my illness.
list.cn: 我生病期间许多朋友来看我。

list.en: Are you feeling any better?
Are you still in a lot of pain?
What do you usually do to fight the cold?
Is there anything you need?
When are you leaving hospital?
How are you feeling today?
Are you feeling better today?
You look good today.
I brought you some fruits.
I came as soon as I heard.
list.cn: 我一听到消息就赶来了。

list.en: Get well soon.
I am feeling a bit better now.
I think sleep is the best medicine.
list.cn: 我认为睡眠是最好的药。

list.en: I am recovering.
